t: Goodturn Tire & Auto Accelerates Growth and Positive Momentum, Officially Launches Platform with 24 Locations Across Florida, Michigan and North Carolina
s: April 24, 2024 - NEW YORK, April 24, 2024--Co-Founders David Manning and Seth Sands, today announced the official launch of Goodturn Tire & Auto ("Goodturn"), an automotive services platform focused on tire repair and maintenance services comprised of a network of premier brands.
